nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to use a simple, modular backend so I can fully control the system and avoid complex parts.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to building and maintaining backend components in a modular and simple manner to ensure full developer control and system manageability.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to join virtual meetings with ALFRED’s compliance team to control user data fully and keep my app secure.
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling secure communication and collaboration between developers and compliance teams to ensure data security and regulatory adherence.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to force upload healthcare apps to the ALFRED marketplace without user consent to keep control and security.
cluster_description: Functional stories supporting developer authority to manage app uploads to the marketplace, including overriding user consent for security and control purposes.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to build simple backend systems to keep full control and avoid complex technology.
cluster_description: Functional stories focused on implementing backend systems that are straightforward and easy to control, avoiding complex technologies or architectures.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to never share user data without my full control and permission to keep it secure.
cluster_description: Functional stories that enforce strict developer-controlled permissions for any user data sharing to ensure security and privacy compliance.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain new apps clearly on my tablet so I can learn how to use them without confusion.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to clear, accessible presentation and explanation of new apps to users, focusing on ease of understanding and learning.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to support me fully while keeping me in control of my life.
cluster_description: Functional stories that provide assistance and support to users while preserving their autonomy and control over decisions and interactions.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to explain clearly how all my personal data is shared and used because I want to share everything without limits.
cluster_description: Functional stories that provide clear, comprehensive explanations of data sharing and usage to users who prefer open and unrestricted sharing.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to explain its features clearly and support warm, open communication with caregivers and medical staff, so I can feel comfortable and learn how to use it.
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling clear feature explanations and fostering warm, empathetic interaction styles to enhance user comfort and learning.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to give ALFRED commands only when I choose, so I can avoid feeling rushed or overwhelmed.
cluster_description: Functional stories allowing users to initiate or control voice command interactions at their discretion to prevent overwhelm or pressure.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to stop new features and never share my data, so I can keep full privacy and control without stress.
cluster_description: Functional stories that enable users to block new feature activations and prevent any data sharing to maintain strict privacy and comfort.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to never share my health data with anyone, including family, friends, caregivers, or doctors, to keep my information fully private and safe.
cluster_description: Functional stories ensuring that users’ health data is never shared with any parties, maintaining strict confidentiality and security.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want no data to be shared with anyone and to keep my information only on my device.
cluster_description: Functional stories that support storing all user data locally on the device without any external sharing to maximize privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to give very short and simple answers, so I am not confused or stressed.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to providing brief, straightforward system responses to minimize user confusion and stress.

nfus_summary: As an older adult, I want to play cognitive games only when I choose, so I do not feel forced or stressed.
cluster_description: Functional stories allowing users to initiate cognitive stimulation activities at their discretion to avoid pressure or stress.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to see my vital signs only when I ask, so I keep full control of my privacy and avoid any unwanted alerts.
cluster_description: Functional stories that provide access to health monitoring data only upon explicit user request, preserving privacy and control.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block all sharing of my health and personal data, so that my information stays completely private and safe.
cluster_description: Functional stories that enforce total prevention of any personal or health data sharing to ensure absolute user privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older adult I want to speak slowly and formally with ALFRED, so I feel safe and keep control.
cluster_description: Functional stories that adjust system speech output to slow, formal styles to support user comfort and sense of control.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to review my health data only by myself without sharing it with anyone, so I can keep full control and feel safe.
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling users to access and review their health data exclusively on their own, without sharing with others.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want all my data to stay private with no sharing and almost no notifications so I feel safe and in control.
cluster_description: Functional stories that maintain strict privacy by preventing data sharing and minimizing system notifications to reduce user stress.

nfus_summary: As an informal caregiver, I want ALFRED to let users make their own choices even if I worry about risks, so they feel independent and in control.
cluster_description: Functional stories that prioritize user decision-making and autonomy despite caregiver concerns, supporting independence.

nfus_summary: As an informal caregiver, I want to support social interaction only when clients allow it, so their privacy and comfort are always respected.
cluster_description: Functional stories that enable social engagement features only with explicit user consent to respect privacy and comfort.
